(d) Contracting authority The Board may enter into and perform such contracts as may be appropriate to carry out its business, but the Board may not enter into any contract which would obligate the Board to expend an amount greater than the amount available to the Board for the purpose of such contract during the fiscal year in which the expenditure is to be made.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Obtaining and acceptance of non-Federal funds and resources; indirect resources

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Obtaining and acceptance of non-Federal funds and resources; indirect resources

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Acceptance and utilization of services of voluntary, uncompensated personnel

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Acceptance and utilization of services of voluntary, uncompensated personnel The Board may accept and utilize the services of voluntary, uncompensated personnel.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Lease, etc., of real or personal property

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Lease, etc., of real or personal property The Board may lease (or otherwise hold), acquire, or dispose of real or personal property necessary for, or relating to, the duties of the Board.
